Headline: #65 Grand Temporary Reroute near Grand/Springfield
ShortDescription: 65 Grand buses are temporarily rerouted via Grand, Pulaski, Division, Hamlin, Grand and over the regular route due to, street blockage near Grand/Springfield.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#65 Grand buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Grand, Pulaski, Division, Hamlin, Grand and over the regular route due to, street blockage near Grand/Springfield.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Southbound Temporary #54B South Cicero Reroute near Cicero/Cermak
ShortDescription: Southbound 54B South Cicero buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Cicero, Cermak, Kenton and Cermak due to street blockage near Cicero/Cermak.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

Southbound #54B South Cicero buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Cicero, Cermak, Kenton and Cermak due to street blockage near Cicero/Cermak.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 63rd-bound Green Line Service Running with Delays
ShortDescription: 63rd-bound Green Line trains are running with delays at Oak Park.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
63rd-bound Green Line trains are running with delays at Oak Park due to an earlier sick customer.

Personnel are working to restore normal service. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Temporary Northbound #86 Narragansett/Ridgeland Reroute near Narragansett/Montrose
ShortDescription: Northbound 86 Narragansett/Ridgeland buses are temporarily rerouted near Narragansett/Montrose.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #86 Narragansett/Ridgeland buses are temporarily rerouted via Narragansett, Montrose, Austin, Gunnison, Nagle, and resume normal route, due to street blockage near Narragansett/Montrose.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
